description: Twin stick arena Rogue-Like from independent developer Panic Arts. Standard rogue-like with mechanics such as random items, potions, and arena layouts are present.  The game also features RPG style character progression through attribute and talent points with a skill tree.  The game currently consists of 4 acts, 4 playable characters, and 3 unlockable difficulties with Hardcore (permanent death) mode.
name: Hero Siege
